title: Issue while building openspeedshop  (older version of binutils?)
body:
I am trying to build openspeedshop on Ubuntu 16.04 and I see following (while building cbtf-krell) : 

```
.............
  /home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.1/binutils-2.24-dk6wlwesfajvuudbqzutq3fkx5kubp5t/bin/ld:
  final link failed: Bad value

  collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

  CMakeFiles/cmTC_91ae1.dir/build.make:97: recipe for target 'cmTC_91ae1'
  failed
  make[1]: *** [cmTC_91ae1] Error 1

  make[1]: Leaving directory
  '/tmp/guest/spack-stage/spack-stage-Wky2l2/cbtf-krell/build_cbtf_krell/CMakeFiles/CMakeTmp'
  Makefile:126: recipe for target 'cmTC_91ae1/fast' failed

  make: *** [cmTC_91ae1/fast] Error 2
  CMake will not be able to correctly generate this project.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:21 (project)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!

```

If I look into `CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log` I see:

```
/home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc  -O2 -g     CMakeFiles/cmTC_91ae1.dir/testCCompiler.c.o  -o cmTC_91ae1 -rdynamic
/home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.1/binutils-2.24-dk6wlwesfajvuudbqzutq3fkx5kubp5t/bin/ld: /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/5/../../../x86_64-linux-gnu/crti.o: unrecognized relocation (0x2a) in section `.init'
/home/guest/workarena/softwares/sources/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu16-x86_64/gcc-5.4.1/binutils-2.24-dk6wlwesfajvuudbqzutq3fkx5kubp5t/bin/ld: final link failed: Bad value
```

@jgalarowicz : Is this due to old version of binutils that openspeedshop depends on ?

```
depends_on("binutils@2.24+krellpatch", type='build')
```
